strings.RRP_ITEM_INTROINSECT_PICKUP: Weaken those who hurt you. Heal from weakened enemies.
strings.RRP_ITEM_INTROINSECT_DESC: After getting hurt, <style=cIsUtility>weaken</style> the enemy's <style=cIsUtility>attack speed by {1}%</style> and <style=cIsUtility>movement speed by {2}%</style> for <style=cIsUtility>{0} seconds</style> <style=cStack>(+{0} seconds per stack)</style>. Every <style=cIsDamage>{4} hits</style> on weakened enemies <style=cIsHealing>heals</style> you for <style=cIsHealing>{3}% your maximum health</style>.
strings.RRP_ITEM_INTROINSECT_LORE:
<style=cSub>Order: Insect
Tracking Number: 70*****
Estimated Delivery: 2/17/2057
Shipping Method: Special (Client insisted on slower than average delivery)
Shipping Address: Collectors Garden, Earth
Shipping Details:</style>

A live, rare, large ladybug specimen, you sure you want them to ship this? yes? 
A- and you want them to "Get it to you slower than usual to not hurt the bugs feelings"?
Alright then, we will acquire the items for its habitat on the list you wrote, and put them alongside the bug.
Here's hoping it doesn't explode during lightspeed transit.
